title: Titiloli
cookies-message: Wannan shafin yana amfani da cookies don mu kawo karin bayani game da shafinmu.
footer-all-rights-reserved: Carelyo. Duk wanda aka daukar sababbin hakki.
PhoneInput-phone-desc: Don Allah shigar da namban teburi
PhoneInput-number-error: Da fatan za a shigar da namban tebur mai suna
PhoneInput-enter-placeholder: Shigar da lamba namban ka tare da +234
login-account-exists: Ana da akauntin da ke daidai
login-redirect-admin: Ana kewaye zuwa Dashboard na System Admin
login-redirect-doctor: Ana kewaye zuwa Dashboard na Dokta
login-error: Login baya ba shi da lafiya ba
login-description-header: Ba a sani ba gaban wannan shafin?
login-form-password-desc: Don Allah shigar da kalmar sirrika
forgotpass-onerror-title: An kasa tsarin mugun sauke kalmar sirri
forgotpass-onerror-message: Ba za a iya sauke kalmar sirri a yanzu ba. Lalle a sake gwadawa
forgotpass-title-desc: Shigar da adireshin imel dinka don samar da hanyar sauke kalmar sirri
forgotpass-response-title: Hanyar sauke kalmar sirri da aka bukaci
forgotpass-response-info1: Idan adireshin imel da aka shigar aka fi sani ya da aka wuce,
forgotpass-response-info2: don Allah duba imel dinka don saurara wata ayyuka da aka bukaci.
newpass-change-error: Samar da sauke kalmar sirri baza ta dafe
newpass-form-desc: Tura bayanai na wannan form din don samar da hanyar sauke kalmar sirri
register-notif-success: Don Allah duba imel dinka don sake daidaitawa
register-notif-error: Samar da daidaitawa ba ta dafe ba
register-form-referral: Ku kasance da zamu baka da kowa a Carelyo.
register-form-enter-details: Da fatan za a shigar da bayanai dinka don samar da akaunt.
register-form-email-desc: Za mu aika kwafi na amince na imel
register-form-tos-desc: Idan ka tace, za ka amince da amincinmu da Fasaha da Kwarewar Daƙiƙƙiyar
